contextId.information: The gods were believed to shine brightly with light. AT: "Man four is shining brightly with light as a son of the gods would shine" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: The brilliance of the fourth is like a son of the gods

contextId.information: "year 3 of the rule of Cyrus the king of Persia" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: the third year of Cyrus king of Persia

contextId.information: "after them a fourth king will come into power who will have more money than the three before him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: a fourth will be far richer than all the others
